mapper.sql: emp.EMPNO as emp_EMPNO, emp.ENAME as emp_ENAME, emp.JOB as emp_JOB, emp.MGR as emp_MGR, emp.HIREDATE as emp_HIREDATE, emp.SAL as emp_SAL, emp.COMM as emp_COMM, emp.DEPTNO as emp_DEPTNO
mapper.insert:
insert into emp
ENAME,
JOB,
MGR,
HIREDATE,
SAL,
COMM,
DEPTNO,
#{ENAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update emp
ENAME = #{ENAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOB = #{JOB,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MGR = #{MGR,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HIREDATE = #{HIREDATE,jdbcType=DATE},
SAL = #{SAL,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COMM = #{COMM,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEPTNO = #{DEPTNO,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where EMPNO = #{EMPNO,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update emp set ENAME = #{ENAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOB = #{JOB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MGR = #{MGR,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HIREDATE = #{HIREDATE,jdbcType=DATE}, SAL = #{SAL,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COMM = #{COMM,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEPTNO = #{DEPTNO,jdbcType=INTEGER} where EMPNO = #{EMPNO,jdbcType=INTEGER}
